nodes.text: Jon's wife was a female Human wife of the Corellian named Jon living in Coronet City during the the Galactic War. During the Battle of Corellia in 3640 BBY Jon an his wife had an argument and he went out to clear his head. Unfortunately, when the rocket trams stopped working, he got trapped in the Axial Park.
Jon's wife appears in the video game Star Wars: The Old Republic as an unnamed NPC at the Blastfield Shipyards rocket tram station.
